name: Windows Defender: PC Guardian
description:
You've just downloaded potentially malicious software. But hark! It was malicious! Now Defender-Chan must protect your pc. Good luck! 

This project was submitted to the Fall 2021 Game-A-Bull game jam, hosted by the USF GameDev Club.

The theme was "Guardian". In this game, you play as Defender-Chan, fighting off viruses and protecting your pc from the cantankerous hands of shady websites. 

Move - arrow keys
C - select
Z - back

Developed by Kelvin
Graphics by Justin and Grima
Sound by NecroseN
